title: 0.08 mm Thin Skin With Lace Front
body_html:
Skin Hairpiece For Men With French Lace Front Skin hair system with lace front is designed using a new generation, thin poly (skin) base material with about 1.5 inches of lace material for the front and hairline, offering both a durable unit and a realistic and natural look. This toupee for men is perfect for those looking for a low-maintenance system (skin material) but who prefer the effect of the lace material for the hairline look. For the skin material part, the adhesive is applied to both the skin material and the scalp, creating a strong and long-lasting bond. This results in less frequent maintenance/retouches than our all-lace systems.   Base Material 0.06 mm polyurethane with a 1.5 inches high-grade french lace front Default Size 10 x 8 inches (Length x Width) Hair Grade Remy Indian Density Medium-light (90%-110%) Wave/Curl Standard body wave Lifespan 4 to 6 months 💡 Why Choose This Hair System? - Ultra-thin, natural-looking base for seamless blending - Lightweight and breathable for all-day comfort - Designed for durability with proper maintenance - Ideal for achieving a natural hairline with a secure fit 🛒 Order now and enjoy a confidence-boosting, natural look!

Skin Hairpiece For Men With French Lace Front Skin hair system with lace front is designed using a new generation, thin poly (skin) base material with about 1.5 inches of lace material for the front and hairline, offering both a durable unit and a realistic and natural look. This toupee for men is perfect for those looking for a low-maintenance system (skin material) but who prefer the effect of the lace material for the hairline look. For the skin material part, the adhesive is applied to both the skin material and the scalp, creating a strong and long-lasting bond. This results in less frequent maintenance/retouches than our all-lace systems.   Base Material 0.06 mm polyurethane with a 1.5 inches high-grade french lace front Default Size 10 x 8 inches (Length x Width) Hair Grade Remy Indian Density Medium-light (90%-110%) Wave/Curl Standard body wave Lifespan 4 to 6 months 💡 Why Choose This Hair System? - Ultra-thin, natural-looking base for seamless blending - Lightweight and breathable for all-day comfort - Designed for durability with proper maintenance - Ideal for achieving a natural hairline with a secure fit 🛒 Order now and enjoy a confidence-boosting, natural look!

Key Features:

  • Base Material: High-quality polyurethane
  • Default Size: Standard dimensions available
  • Hair Quality: Premium Indian Remy hair
  • Density: Medium-light for a natural look
  • Wave/Curl Pattern: Standard body wave
  • Lifespan: 3-6 months with proper care

Designed for comfort, durability, and a seamless natural appearance.
